function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Flattening the infection curve","Impact":"Overwhelming the healthcare system with hospitalizations and severe cases","Mitigation":"Implementing social interventions and healthcare measures to slow the spread of the disease","Technologies":"Healthcare technologies for monitoring, testing, and treating contagious diseases","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Economic impact of the pandemic","Impact":"Reduction in wealth and economic instability","Mitigation":"Implementing economic support measures and interventions to stabilize the economy","Technologies":"Financial technologies for stimulus packages, support funds, and economic forecasting","People":"Businesses, workers, and individuals","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Transferability of the model to other societies","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling of contagious disease spread and potential interventions in different regions","Mitigation":"Conducting further studies and adapting the model to account for regional variations in social, demographic, and economic parameters","Technologies":"Data analytics and modeling tools for adapting the model to different regions","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
